content: and flat joining and breaking color 2 as needed knit rs pull tail through those 3 sts row purl ws row cable method cast on *tip work the first and last st in garter st knitting it each row this will make it easier to pick up sts for *insert right-hand between the first and second st the edging on the needle wrap strand of yarn around right needle as you would for a knit st and pull through slide work down needles to begin working on a rs place this new loop onto left-hand needle repeat row join color 2 and knit across all sts from * once more turn work 90 degrees and pick up and knit sts from finishing side of banner approximately 1 st for each row worked weave in ends and block banner flat bohochicfiberco com 2023 contact & support for pattern support check the pattern errata page on my website here https //bohochicfiberco com/pages/pattern-errata is your question not answered send me an email here annmlupton@gmail com connect & share find me on instagram ravelry and youtube as @bohochicfiberco if you share photos of your project please make sure to tag me @bohochicfiberco and use #craftivism and #readbannedbooksbanner newsletter be the first to know about new pattern releases exclusive sales and special events subscribe here https //mailchi mp/7373461fa5b1/email-newsletter test knitting would you be interested in test knitting a design subscribe to my test knitting email list here https //mailchi mp/f447c58f3cc6/test-knitters you might also like wash ashore pullover bookish cardi rays crop
